name: I SPY Game Pack
overview: In Ultimate I SPY, play I SPY in a recolutionary new way that will have you up and moving! Play paddleball, throw darts, juggle and more to solve 40 I SPY riddles to unveil a mysterious machine, and bring it to life. In I SPY Spooky Mansion, discover a thrilling I SPY adventure hidden inside the Spooky Mansion. To find the secret escape, explore the house and search for over 400 objects while solving 33 I SPY riddles. HIDDEN OBJECT ADVENTURES: Includes two I SPY hidden object games for Wii – Ultimate I SPY and I SPY Spooky Mansion. IMMERSIVE 3-D RIDDLES AND ENVIROMENTS: 3-D riddle screens allowplayers to navigate 360 degree game environments and offer multiple angle views. HOURS OF GAMEPLAY: Enjoy hours of gameplay solving over 70 I SPY riddles—40 in Ultimate I SPY and 33 in I SPY Spooky Mansion. MINI-GAMES IN EVERY RIDDLE: Play over 60 interactive mini-games hidden in the riddles. Play the maracas or juggle to solve riddles in Ultimate I SPY or break codes or mix potions in I SPY Spooky Mansion. MULTI-PLAYER GAMES: Multi-player options allow two players to compete in 10 replayable games in Ultimate I SPY, while I SPY Spooky Mansion allows up to four players to solve riddles and play games. Features o Over 70 I SPY Riddles and over 60 Interactive Mini-Games o Multiple Unique 3D Environments & Scavenger Hunt Games o 10 Replayable Multi-Player Games o 1-4 Players
